title: Caribbean welcome
brief_description: Presents the royal tour by the Queen and Duke of Edinburgh of the Caribbean countries in February 1966, showing scenes in British Guiana, Trinidad and Jamaica.
description: Presents the royal tour by the Queen and Duke of Edinburgh of the Caribbean countries in February 1966, showing scenes in British Guiana, Trinidad and Jamaica.
